nodes.text: Chortose was an astronomical object located in the Chortose system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Rseik sector. It was the homeworld of the sentient Chortose species, including the engineer and starship mechanic Porgo Goo.

Chortose was first mentioned in the 1990 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 6: Tramp Freighters, which was written by Mark Rein-Hagen and Stewart Wieck for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Chortose system, and therefore Chortose itself, in grid square N-20.
